advancement.creatania.root.desc: Creatania is a Contraption Magical Tech Mod
advancement.creatania.mana_machine_compo: Obtain a mana machine component, the core of all mana machines
advancement.creatania.mana_generator.des: Create your first Mana Generator, now you can convert inert mana fluid to real mana
advancement.creatania.mana_condenser.des: You're now ready to extract mana out of thin air, though it might be corrupted in the process
advancement.creatania.mana_motor: Don't Stress over it... you'll MANAge just fine
advancement.creatania.mana_motor.desc: You're now ready to generate rotation force with mana
advancement.creatania.lords_work.desc:
The llama guy got what he deserves, thanks for your service§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.buff_from_purified:
Purified mana might be inert, but still contains a lot of power within§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.buff_from_real_man:
Botania mana blocks are the real deal, pure condensed magical power§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.debuff_from_corrup:
Corrupt mana might be inert, but still extremely dangerous§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.botania_block_with:
Pick up blocks from botania using the create wrench. Be very careful with it§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.prevent_ender_enti:
Corrupt mana blocks, among its many properties, can prevent ender entities from teleporting§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.produce_mana_gel_f:
Produce mana gel by having a slime touch purified inert mana fluid§7
(Hidden Advancement)
